testcase.name: verifying functionalities in makemytrip portal
testcase.system-out: Given Given user is already on home page....................................passed When user select source and destination.....................................passed When user select departure and return date..................................passed When user select passengers like adults and childrens combination...........passed When user select low priced airlines and click book now button..............passed When user change Premium Flex from Economic class and click continue........passed When user click Fare Rules and take Airline Fee and MMT Fee for two hours to three days and sum it for Adults and Children and print Console.passed Then user take Total Amount and Validate and print Console..................passed
